product_name: Topeak MTX Dual Side Bike Rack Frame
long_description: These pannier frame supports clip on to your Topeak QR Beam to transform your rack into a pannier-compatible rack. Clip-on frame is made of 6061-T6 aluminum for strength and light weight. Attaches to Topeak MTX or EX BeamRacks in seconds, sold separately. Perfect for using the Topeak MTX trunk bag with panniers, sold separately.
short_description: These pannier frame supports clip on to your Topeak QR Beam to transform your rack into a pannier-compatible rack.
